name: 2 Girls 1 Duck
description:
Introduction:

Hi, this is a 3D Unity Game group project made for my Game Programming 2 called "2 Girls 1 Duck" done in pair work.  We were free to use any 3D Models although we couldn't find free farmer 3D Models, so we decided to use anime girls in the Unity Asset Store.

Game Made By: 

Haoting(Programmer), Hamzah(Me, Programmer)

Game's Story Description:

Sapphi Chan and Rin are farmers and decided to blow each other up using ducks! Plant ducks and get your way through by blowing the terrain up with the ducks! Lure nearby ducks with onigiri and they would head towards them and explode instantly!

Controls:

Sapphi Chan (Player 1): Keyboard

Move: W, A, S, D  |  Deploy Bomb: Spacebar  |   Deploy Bait: E

Rin (Player 2): PS4 DualShock Controller

Move: PS4 D-Pad  |  Deploy Bomb: X  |  Deploy Bait: O
